title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
EB: The group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not set. When a table report item is added without setting the dataset and the user tries to create a new table group, they should be able to do so. The user should be able to go and define a group, even if the dataset is not defined.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset. 2. Try creating a new table group.
